alert.note: Alert for Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 5:01PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kings and southwestern Tulare Counties through 530 PM PST... At 500 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Visalia, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. Cold air funnel SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Visalia, Tulare, Porterville, Lindsay, Farmersville, Exeter, Poplar-Cotton Center, Woodville, Strathmore, Tipton and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. Theis type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
